image_prompt: A dramatic Baroque-style painting depicting the Crowning with Thorns. Christ, bathed in a celestial glow, kneels as soldiers press a jagged wreath onto His brow, His expression serene amidst suffering. To the side, a crumbling marble bust of Tiberius gazes emptily, its imperial grandeur dwarfed by the quiet majesty of the suffering King. The contrast of light and shadow heightens the tension between earthly mockery and heavenly triumph. In the background, faint hints of a distant cross foreshadow the redemption to come.
